info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 11:02PM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas...
St Francis River Diversion Ditch at Madison
For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis, Lake City, Madison...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...St Francis River Diversion Ditch at Madison.
* WHEN...From late Sunday night until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Homes and numerous secondary roads are threatened.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 24.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning and continue rising to a crest of 34.5 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
